RandomProblem.title: Random Challenge
RandomProblem.description: A random cipher text to be deciphered by you.

ProblemCode.title: Challenge Code
ProblemCode.description: Enter code for a specific challenge.

Frequency.title: Frequency
Frequency.tooltip: Investigate the relative frequency of letters in the cipher text.

Friedmann.title: Friedmann
Friedmann.tooltip: Investigate the friedmann characteristic of the cipher text considering different key length.

Kasiski.title: Kasiski
Kasiski.tooltip: Investigate repeated segements in the cipher text.
Kasiski.NoteGrey: Grey characters are part of multiple segments.

Table.title: Table
Table.tooltip: Display the cipher text in a table.
Table.NotePink?: Pink <0>?</0> indicate empty positions in the table.

Substitution.title: Substitution
Substitution.tooltip: Replace different letters of the alphabet and see the changes to the text.
